segments.text: I notice the boy is really reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems to have a plan, using the plate to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching him balance on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've practiced this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is really making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed it yet, she's standing right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be slippery and dangerous soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get into trouble if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, which is sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
